attributes.action: All people breeding companion animals should be registered for Tax purposes
attributes.additional_details: The UK's Animal Welfare organisations are at crisis point dealing with the sheer numbers of unwanted companion animals. This crisis is being deliberately fueled by a sub-culture of breeders bringing animals into the world with no regard for their futures and many of our inner cities have become an unregistered and unregulated dog and cat producing industry. Such breeders are earning many thousands each year in undeclared income. We call upon the Government to make sale the of puppies and kittens illegal by any means without VAT registration and income received from selling animals to be deducted from state benefits.
